name: Total TakeOver (The_Scientist___Games)
description:
Overview:

Total Takeover is a turn-based strategy game for 2-4 players. The goal of the game: Total Domination. Conquer your opponent's colonies and claim planet-wide hegemony!

Currently, the game is relatively stable. Updates come as they come, we try to work on this whenever the absence of homework permits us, so check back every now and again to see if anything new has come out!

Features:
  • 2-4 Players
  • 22 Different Unit Types
  • Multiple Maps
  • Teams and Free-For-All GameModes
  • Land, Air, and Naval Combat
  • Difficult Terrain and Natural Obstacles
Credits:

Game Design and Artwork by: Nifttykillshot

Programming and Music/Sounds: The_Scientist___
